txt.en: Destroy the Ring-forge of Orthanc and its protectors
You have destroyed the Ring-forge of Orthanc and its protectors
You have defeated  Dhâr the Smelter within the Foundry on Tier 1 beneath Isengard
The Foundry of Isengard is commanded by Saruman's most trusted lieutenants.
You have Gurbák, the bellows master in the Foundry beneath Isengard on Tier 1.
You have defeated the  Ring-forge of Orthanc and its protectors on Tier 1
To earn this deed, you must defeat Dhâr, Gurbák, and thwart the plans of Saruman within the Foundry.
TBD To earn this deed, you must defeat Dhâr the Smelter, Gurbák, the Bellows Master, and The Ring-forge of Orthanc and it's protectors.
